downloadDescription: The SDL Quick Security References will help you better understand and address common attacks that may be affecting your software, Web sites, and users.

downloadFile.name: Quick Security Reference - Exposure of Sensitive Information.docx
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/e/e/7/ee7b9cf4-6a59-4832-8ede-b018175f4610/Quick Security Reference - Exposure of Sensitive Information.docx

detailsSection: With the SDL Quick Security References (QSR), the Security Development Lifecycle (SDL) team introduces a series of basic guidance papers designed to address common vulnerabilities from the perspective of multiple business roles - business decision maker, architect, developer, and tester/QA. These papers will help you address a critical business problem now while moving you toward SDL adoption in the future.
detailsSection_file_name: Quick Security Reference - Exposure of Sensitive Information.docx
systemRequirementsSection:
Windows 2000; Windows 2000 Server; Windows Server 2003; Windows Server 2008; Windows Vista; Windows XP; Windows 7 
This release includes documentation MS Word format. You can download a MS Word reader for free if you do not have MS Word installed.
installInstructionSection:
1. Download the file by clicking on the "Download" button. 
2. Select "Save” and specify a directory on your local disk.
